name: David Ramirez
text: ...There's a Young Justice game out on Steam!    I'm kind of interested, but it's not a cheapo game, so I want it to not suck. I'd really dig it if it were a turn-based squad style tactical rpg, but it doesn't seem to be that....    Also sort of interested in Ring Runner, but I'll think about it some more. That one's more likely though, it's a cheap game.
